alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 8:46AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion County through 915 AM EST... At 846 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weirsdale, or near The Villages, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Juniper Springs, Weirsdale, Ocklawaha, Moss Bluff, Lake Weir and Summerfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for northern Florida.
